thread.section_title: The Connaught - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent - but give Helene Darroze a miss
thread.title_full: Excellent - but give Helene Darroze a miss - Review of The Connaught, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 36robin
title: Excellent - but give Helene Darroze a miss
text: An outstanding hotel and excellent weekend, marred only by the truly awful Helene Darroze restaurant. By a distance the worse experience I've had in a Michelin starred establishment. Would recommend a trip to the Connaught Bar instead.
